alert.note: Alert for Barbour; Northwest Randolph; Upshur (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Randolph, northeastern Upshur and southern Barbour Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 529 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Audra State Park, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Buckhannon, Audra State Park, Belington, Junior, Womelsdorf (Coalton), Volga, Ellamore, Overhill, Century, and Hodgesville. This includes Route 33 between mile markers 15 and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
